duties_responsibilities.duty: Screen clinical study participants for inclusion in clinical trials.
Maintain a database of clinical study participants.
Develop outreach efforts related to participant recruitment.
Interact with a wide range of customers and study participants via phone, email, text, and in person.
Coordinate with laboratory's Principal Investigator to ensure adequate subject recruitment for each study.
Assist with marketing and advertising efforts as needed, including social media.
Maintain a safe and positive laboratory environment.
Assist with various other clinical lab tasks as required.
